stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.


Respond to parts a, b, and c.

  1. Identify ONE way that environmental conditions contributed to the beginning of industrialization in the eighteenth and early nineteenth centuries.

  2. Explain ONE way societies or governments reacted to industrialization in the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries.

  3. Explain ONE way human activity led to environmental changes in the twentieth century.
